definitions.definition: A confection of caramelized sugar and nuts.
definitions.example: As a child, my favorite candy was peanut brittle.

definitions.definition: Anything resembling this confection, such as flapjack, a cereal bar, etc.
Inflexible, liable to break or snap easily under stress or pressure.
definitions.example: A diamond is hard but brittle.

definitions.definition: Not physically tough or tenacious; apt to break or crumble when bending.
definitions.example: Shortbread is my favorite cold pastry, yet being so brittle it crumbles easily, and a lot goes to waste.

definitions.definition: Said of rocks and minerals with a conchoidal fracture; capable of being knapped or flaked.

definitions.example: What a brittle personality! A little misunderstanding and he's an emotional wreck.

definitions.definition: Diabetes that is characterized by dramatic swings in blood sugar level.
